Awesome sequel to an already great game. Not only does it bring a great story but a genius co-op mode that's extremely fun; and if you want more there's workshop integration as well.

Вспоминаю эту игру я смело могу сказать "Это ШЕДЕВР", очередной шедевр который вдохновил многих людей и фанатов. Вообщем хочу сказать.. Игра ШЕДЕВР! 10 из 10.

Honestly Portal 1 and 2 are some of the best games i've ever played. Ive loved this game since i played it years ago. I became so obsessed i researched how to make my own Prosthetic heel springs so I could be just like Chell. A true classic game.

Again, i am disappointed Valve only knows how to count to 2. Maybe the money off of these games could go to some tutoring so you can learn the next numbers.
The narrative of the story was awesome, witty and fun. While it was pretty short it's definitely worth getting.

This game has a very good campaign and a vary good story line. Great Job Valve. :)

Uma sequência que expandiu a genialidade de Portal. Aqui o enredo é mais interessante com novos personagens, os puzzles mais criativos com novas mecânicas e o visual mais polido com as melhorias gráficas. Recomendado a todos que adoram um desafio mental com uma pitada de sarcasmo! Nota 10!

10/10
Portal 2 mejora todo lo bueno que ya tenia el primer Portal.Mas duracion,mejores puzzles,mejor historia.

Плюсы:
Одиночный режим заставит вас поломать голову, а юмор не заставит скучать по ходу прохождения.
Кооперативный режим действительно является таковым, в соло вы его не пройдёте.
В лучших традициях Valve - развитая культура фанатской мастерской. 

Минусы:
На любителя 3D головоломок.

Certainly an excellent game, of which added plenty of iconic characters to Valve's "mythos". From GLaDOS's tragic backstory, to new ever-welcome characters such as a sarcastic and sassy Wheatley and a go-getter Cave Johnson, Portal 2 serves as an ever-pleasing sequel to the first game. New gameplay additions such as the gels and the Excursion Funnel not only entertain with their mere appearance and ever soothing sounds, but revolutionize the relatively simpler gameplay that came before. 

The only thing I find displeasing about the game was the runtime. The test chambers seemed relatively easy, which in turn decreased the amount of time it took to progress through the story substantially. Before I knew it, the single-player campaign was over. Had the test chambers been a bit more dense difficulty-wise, I feel like this game would be much more satisfying than it already is.
Muito bom, Foda, Do caralho, Da hora demais, Bacanudo, adorei, Amei

A fun puzzle game with a hillarious story. Addictiv and fun until the end. The multiplayer is also fun and the puzzle creator is easy to use and fun to make. Multiplayer is also alot of fun with a good friend.

[h1][b]More than just a puzzle game[/b][/h1]
I created a steam account 2 years back. I had just got borderlands but to use the "Friends and Chat Feature" I had to make an additional dollar worth of purchase. I was looking around for such games and found Portal 1 & 2 for just 1$. (Not kidding)

Honestly, at first, I didn't feel like playing a puzzle game. Now that I was cleaning up my inventory, I had realized that I wish I had played this decade-old game sooner. The puzzle concepts aren't just part of the game just for the sake of keeping it under the puzzle genre but were rather tightly related to the core story.

The Story and the chambers design were so intriguing that I didn't know I had finished the series in just 2 days.

A 10/10 game. Honestly deserves more than its current price which is just 4$.
jogo incrível, bom pra passar o tempo e eh de puzzle
Топовая головоломка, ну это и так всем известно.
Fun and challenging riddles. Cool coop modes.
Хорошая головоломка with black humor, искусственный интеллект сказал мне что я сирота, рекомендую
Juga portal 1 primero y vas a amar este juego, viene con un modo multiplayer de a 2 que es la continuación de la historia principal. Muy Divertido.

Так получилось, что не был знаком с этой вселенной и на глаза попался мод ко второй части — Portal reloaded, где нужно пройти уровни-головоломки с помощью трёхпортальной пушки. Сполна преисполнившись и пройдя примерно за 16 часов мод, решил познакомиться с порталом два, благодаря которому был возможен мод и третий портал. Оказывается, портал и портал 2 были в библиотеке (а второй, оказывается, уже был установлен на устройство). Теперь не было никаких преград поиграть в сие творение. И вот пройдя пока больше половины игры уже скажу, что это стоит того, что бы поиграть. Я думаю это не всем может понравиться, но попробовать точно стоит!

Builds upon the already stellar gameplay mechanics of the first Portal game by introducing paint that can be applied to surfaces for fun effects. This sequel still maintains their quality of interesting puzzles as well. The single player campaign narrative is a bit more complex than the first game with some additional characters as well as some interesting table turns. The characters are quirky and interesting as ever! A must play but I recommend you wait until it goes on sale.
